mapper.select: select t1.row_id id, TO_CHAR (t1.created,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') created, t1.username username, t1.fst_name firstName, t1.company_code companyCode, t1.company_code companyCodeLovType, t1.emp_status status, t1.emp_type empType, t1.emp_role role, t1.emp_contact contact, t1.emp_tel contactPhone, 1 errorTimes from LNK_EMP_INFO t1 where not exists ( select s1.user_id from LNK_INTER_APPROVAL_USER s1 where t1.row_id = s1.user_id and s1.approval_node_id = #{mvgParentId} ) and t1.corp_id = #{usercorpid}

select t1.row_id interId, TO_CHAR (t1.created,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') created, t1.user_Id id, t2.username username, t2.fst_name firstName, t2.emp_status status, 1 errorTimes, (case when t2.row_id = t3.user_id then 'Y' else 'N' end) isDefault from LNK_INTER_APPROVAL_USER t1, LNK_EMP_INFO t2, LNK_APPROVAL_FLOW_NODE t3 where t1.user_id = t2.row_id(+) and t1.approval_node_id = t3.row_id(+) and t1.corp_id = #{usercorpid} and t1.approval_node_id = #{mvgParentId}
mapper.insert: insert into LNK_INTER_APPROVAL_USER (row_id, user_id, approval_node_id) values (#{id}, #{mvgSubsetId}, #{mvgParentId})
